daily_fact: Staten Island's snow-removal crews demonstrated remarkable community spirit by assisting Brooklyn during recent storms, showcasing the collaborative resilience of New York City's neighborhoods in challenging times.
topline_md: New York City is facing extreme cold conditions prompting Mayor Mamdani to announce warming shelters, while recent incidents include a tragic fire claiming two elderly lives and a three-alarm fire injuring two others, alongside ongoing public safety concerns and community responses to various crises.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:

- NYC deep freeze continues; single-room warming shelter units announced by Mayor Zohran Mamdani. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
